assertions: This is a .NET 9 + Angular 19 enterprise monorepo (EasyPlatform) using Easy.Platform framework
Backend: Use service-specific repositories (IPlatformQueryableRootRepository, IPlatformQueryableRootRepository, IPlatformQueryableRootRepository) - never generic IPlatformRootRepository
Backend: Use PlatformValidationResult fluent API (.And(), .AndAsync()) - never throw ValidationException
Backend: Side effects (notifications, emails, external APIs) go in Entity Event Handlers (UseCaseEvents/) - never in command handlers
Backend: DTOs own mapping via PlatformEntityDto<TEntity, TKey>.MapToEntity() or PlatformDto<T>.MapToObject() - never map in handlers
Backend: Command + Result + Handler in ONE file under UseCaseCommands/{Feature}/
Backend: Cross-service communication via RabbitMQ message bus only - never direct database access
Frontend: Extend AppBaseComponent, AppBaseVmStoreComponent, or AppBaseFormComponent - never raw Component
Frontend: Use PlatformVmStore for state management - never manual signals
Frontend: Extend PlatformApiService for HTTP calls - never direct HttpClient
Frontend: Always use .pipe(this.untilDestroyed()) for subscriptions - never manual unsubscribe
Frontend: All template elements must have BEM classes (block__element --modifier)
Architecture: Search for existing implementations before creating new code
Architecture: Place logic in LOWEST layer (Entity > Service > Component) to enable reuse
Architecture: Plan before implementing non-trivial tasks - use EnterPlanMode
